infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to record videos of your child's learning moments.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone to record audio with videos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to record videos of your child's learning moments.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone to record audio with videos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos and videos to upload moments.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save photos and videos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos and videos to upload moments.
